text: Ferrari will win 10 or more races
There will be at least one first-time race winner
Less than 15 points separating the top 3 drivers at the summer break
Hamilton does not win a race
Magnussen tells Hulkenberg to 'suck my balls' (or any other publicly verbal altercation)
Williams makes Q3 at least 3 times
At least one race has less than 50% race distance completed before being called off
Both teammates of any team DNF as a result of a collision with each other
Either championship is decided in the last race
The team in the lead at the summer break is NOT the same team that wins the championship
The Formula 2 Driver Champion gets a 2024 F1 seat
Team in 10th place after Race 10 will still be 10th by the end of the season
The winning constructor takes 10 or fewer race wins
Logan Sargeant scores points in any of 3 home races (one of the 3 that are in the USA)
Winning constructor wins by a final score margin of 30% or more
